creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
Hi Dave,

looks as if your patch was backwards :-)

I'll split it into two patches, the hunks that rely on StandardCharsets cannot be used on the 1.9.x branch since it has only been introduces in Java7.

Thanks!

Part of the changes is only present in 1.10.0 (changes to Locator and ManifestClassPath).
creator: bodewig@apache.org

text: Hmm.  I saw the source and target used in build.xml was set to 1.8, this should be changed back if 1.7 is supported.
creator: dbrosius@apache.org
bodewig@apache.org
text: master targets Java8, the 1.9.x branch (from which we'll cut 1.9.8 one day) targets Java5.
